title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<dyn Any>', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1594:13

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Steps:
Compile https://github.com/ZcashFoundation/zebra with Rust nightly.

```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (b3bc6bf31 2022-11-24)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: b3bc6bf31265ac10946a0832092dbcedf9b26805
commit-date: 2022-11-24
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
